arg.name: ip
arg.doc: Network address of the sensor. Mandatory

arg.name: name
arg.doc: Name of the sensor for unique identification, it depends on your URDF implementation. Mandatory.

arg.name: type
arg.doc: Type of sensor, e.g. nano17, it depends on your URDF implementation, check which models this package supports. Mandatory.

arg.name: safety_topic
arg.doc: Topic to advertise for a emergency event

arg.name: safety_threshold
arg.doc: max normalized wrench allowed before a emergency event
